casebody.data:
A. J. HOOVER et al. v. FOX RIG & LUMBER COMPANY et al. No. 3784. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Oct. 21, 1948. E. O. Monnett, of Tulsa, Okl., for appellants. Ezra Dyer and Earl Q. Gray, both of Ardmore, Okl., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Docketed and dismissed, on motion of appellees, for failure to prosecute.
